snippet: A half-built shopping center is slowly being turned into a monument to Boris N. Yeltsin, the ebullient, erratic leader who served as Russia’s first elected president from 1991 to 1999.
abstract: Yekaterinburg Journal; half-built shopping center in Yekaterinburg, Russia, is being transformed into monument to Boris N Yeltsin, who served as Russia’s first elected president from 1991 to 1999, complete with statue towering over complex.

byline.contributor: Nikolay Khalip and Alexandra Odynova contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: A half-built shopping center is slowly being turned into a monument to Boris N. Yeltsin, the ebullient, erratic leader who served as Russia’s first elected president from 1991 to 1999.

headline.main: Where Some May Say No Thanks for the Memories
headline.print_headline: Where Some May Say No Thanks for Memories
